remarks: Product of polynomial functions is polynomial.  Maps-to version of ~ mzpmulmpt .  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Oct-2014.)
statement:
mzpmulmpt $p |- ( ( ( x e. ( ZZ ^m V ) |-> A ) e. ( mzPoly ` V ) /\ ( x e. ( ZZ ^m V ) |-> B ) e. ( mzPoly ` V ) ) -> ( x e. ( ZZ ^m V ) |-> ( A x. B ) ) e. ( mzPoly ` V ) ) $.
$d V x $.
